TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CalendarDay extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 控件中的日期。

span.span: Represents a date in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象表示的日期控件。A object represents a date in the control. 你可以使用此类中的事件处理程序以编程方式访问一个日期的属性，如上呈现控件。You can use this class in the event handler to programmatically access the properties of a date as it is rendered on the control. 这样，您可以确定在一天 （例如日期是可选的选择，今天的日期或周末日期） 的属性并以编程方式控制的外观或一天中的行为。This allows you to determine the properties of the day (such as whether the date is selectable, selected, today's date, or a weekend date) and programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用的属性对象，以确定在所呈现的日期是否事件是在显示的月份中且不是星期六或星期日。The following example demonstrates how to use the properties of a object to determine whether the date being rendered in the event is in the displayed month and do not fall on Saturday or Sunday. 这些日期以黄色显示。These dates are displayed in yellow. 请注意，的属性对象传递给事件处理程序是对象。Note that the property of the object passed into the event handler is the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CalendarDay Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CalendarDay Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CalendarDay Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CalendarDay Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarDayRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarDayRender/CS/calendardayrendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarDayRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarDayRender/VB/calendardayrendervb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 尽管此构造函数不可用，但实例类不通常创建动态。Although this constructor is available, an instance of the class is not typically created dynamically. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |日期Date|`date` 参数的值。The value of the `date` parameter.| |DayNumberTextDayNumberText|`dayNumberText` 参数的值。The value of the `dayNumberText` parameter.| |IsOtherMonthIsOtherMonth|`isOtherMonth` 参数的值。The value of the `isOtherMonth` parameter.| |IsSelectedIsSelected|`isSelected` 参数的值。The value of the `isSelected` parameter.| |IsTodayIsToday|`isToday` 参数的值。The value of the `isToday` parameter.| |IsWeekendIsWeekend|`isWeekEnd` 参数的值。The value of the `isWeekEnd` parameter.|

summary.span: 获取由此类的实例表示的日期。

span.span: Gets the date represented by an instance of this class.
This property is read-only.

value.span: 一个 对象，它包含该类实例所表示的日期。

span.span: A object that contains the date represented by an instance of this class.

value.span: 这使您可以基于该值以编程方式控制日期的外观或行为。

span.span: This allows you to programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day, based on this value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以编程方式确定此类的实例所表示的日期。Use the property to programmatically determine the date represented by an instance of this class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用要进行比较的中呈现的日期事件和今天的日期。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to compare the date being rendered in the event with today's date. 如果日期是今天的日期，它将显示在黄色的单元格中使用红色文本在控件。If the date is today's date, it is displayed in a yellow cell with red text on the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定此类的实例所表示的日期的日编号的等效字符串。Use the property to determine the string equivalent of the day number for the date represented by an instance of this class. 这使您可以基于该值以编程方式控制日期的外观或行为。This allows you to programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day, based on this value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性上显示的所选的日编号控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to display the selected day number on the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以编程方式确定此类的实例所表示的日期是否是月份中显示的月份之外控件。Use the property to programmatically determine whether the date represented by an instance of this class is in a month other than the month displayed in the control. 这允许您以编程方式控制的外观或基于此值在一天的行为。This allows you to programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day based on this value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用的属性对象，以确定在所呈现的日期是否事件在所显示月份并不是星期六或星期日。The following example demonstrates how to use the properties of a object to determine whether the date being rendered in the event is in the displayed month and are not either a Saturday or a Sunday. 这些日期以黄色显示。These dates are displayed in yellow. 请注意，的属性对象传递给事件处理程序是对象。Note that the property of the object passed into the event handler is the object. span.span: if the date can be selected; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定或确定是否可以在中选择此类的实例所表示的日期控件。Use the property to specify or determine whether the date represented by an instance of this class can be selected in the control. 这允许您以编程方式控制外观的行为的一天，基于此值。This allows you to programmatically control the appearance behavior of the day, based on this value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来禁用能力上选择当前日期控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to disable the ability to select the current date on the control. 请注意，的属性对象传递给事件处理程序是对象。Note that the property of the object passed into the event handler is the object. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示由此类的实例表示的日期是否与 控件的 属性所指定的日期相同。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the date represented by an instance of this class is the same date specified by the property of the control.
This property is read-only.

value.span: 如果由此类的实例表示的日期与由 控件的 属性指定的日期相同，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the date represented by an instance of this class is the same date specified by the property of the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来以编程方式确定此类的实例所表示的日期是否为指定的日期相同属性的控件。Use the property to programmatically determine whether the date represented by an instance of this class is the same date specified by the property of the control. 这使您可以基于该值以编程方式控制日期的外观或行为。This allows you to programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day, based on this value. > [!NOTE] > 尽管由指定的日期属性是通常在服务器上的系统日期，它可以将其进行更改，如有必要。Although the date specified by the property is usually the system date on the server, it is possible to change it, if necessary. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定是否在呈现的日期事件是当前日期。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine if the date being rendered in the event is the current date. 如果日期为当前日期，它将显示在黄色的单元格中使用红色文本在。If the date is the current date, it is displayed in a yellow cell with red text on the . 请注意，的属性对象传递给事件处理程序是对象。Note that the property of the object passed into the event handler is the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CalendarDay.IsToday Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CalendarDay.IsToday Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CalendarDay.IsToday Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CalendarDay.IsToday Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
